attributes.action: consider following China's lead by putting forward nationally and globally one child per woman to help reduce world population, and environmental pollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our world is in crisis.  The planet is overpopulated.  We do not have enough resources to sustain ourselves as we exist at present.  Working to reduce world population would go a long way in helping to reduce the strain, and create change.  Contraception is available.  Education is needed globally, not only to control the population boom, but also to help to stop the spread of disease and the overall health costs.
